title: [Large-scale] Generative AI and Responsible Management Education: Autonomy-Based Project Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic principles of management and experience using digital tools
context.additional_context: Project-based learning in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, applying language domain expertise for professional learners (medical/legal/technical fields)

learning_goals: Learners can design ethical management scenarios using generative AI tools and explain their alignment with the SDGs.
Learners can identify at least three ethical dilemmas arising from AI use through autonomous decision-making and propose solutions.
Students can perform team projects using the PBL (Problem-Based Learning) approach and document responsible methods for citing and utilizing AI-generated content.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
